name: Itexus
description:
Itexus is a software development company with a talent pool of 60+ experienced developers. Founded in 2014, we've helped startups, growth companies and established international enterprises to develop advanced and scalable web and mobile software solutions that their customers love. We have PhD engineers on board and are experts in the development of Fintech, Healthcare and Data Science software solutions.
Our specialization includes development, consulting and implementation of:
FINTECH APPLICATIONS 
Digital Banking Credit
Investment & Risk Scoring
Wealth Management
Portfolio Analysis And Optimization
Algorithmic Stock Exchange Trading
Artificial Intelligence in Finance
Natural Language Processing
Financial Prediction / Forecasting
AI-powered Virtual Financial Advisors
Integration With Financial Data Providers
HEALTHCARE APPLICATIONS
HIPAA & HL7-compliant Healthcare Apps
Using FHIR STU3
DEVELOPMENT FOR STARTUPS
Discovery Phase
Prototyping
MVP development
Product development.
QUICK FACTS ABOUT US
6+ years on the market;
Over 80 IT professionals on board, all working under the same roof in Itexus office;
Software engineers, Data Scientists, Business analysts, Project managers, DevOps engineers, QA specialists, UI/UX designers;
Carry out global operations in North America, Western Europe as well as Asia and Pacific. 220+ completed projects for 180+ customers;
Profound expertise in Fintech, Machine Learning and Healthcare domains;
Our founders are hands-on experts supervising key projects, service quality and client relationships.
READ MORE...
